Carmelo Anthony crashed the boards as hard as he worked for open looks at the basket, collecting 13 rebounds and scoring 30 points Wednesday night in the Denver Nuggets' 126-113 win over the tired Phoenix Suns. Simon Cowell is said to have finally persuaded US TV executives to give her a slot on the panel. " Simon Cowell is the boss of this show," a source told the News of the World. He gets what he wants and he wants Cheryl Cole . The money you make on American TV is huge, but there's also a huge risk. "The way American contracts are gives Fox the chance to opt out if viewers don't take to her. But Simon Cowell won't let that happen.
